(I'm sorry, I had to close down your e-mail because it was all 
worthless ranting :)

I'm sorry you have to swear to try and add onto your points.  But if 
you ever send an e-mail like that again, I can assure you, Zardus 
will kick you out.  'Cause he's really a puppet in my grand schemes.

No, not really, I'm the puppet.  But anyway, this is PG-13, not R.  
Though I've heard the 'F' word in PG-13 movies, we don't consider 
that PG-13 material here, we consider it R.  So, if you do that 
again, you'll either be kicked out or moderated.

Have a nice day.  If you have any problems, take it up with the 
Council, that's what we're here for)
